attributes.action: Allow the use of Mobile 'Phones whilst driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During a normal days driving I see literally dozens of "drivers" talking on their Mobile 'phones. Never using Bluetooth or hands free options.Ignoring the "rights-of-way" of other drivers whilst negotiating junctions and Rounbabouts with one hand.I've yet to see a single Police Check Point set up to stop this common practice. I've never read in my local papers of any prosecutions, so I can only conclude that the "Police" in general think this law is a total waste of their time to enforce!
